name: devops-autopilot
description: Intelligent DevOps automation for CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, and infrastructure-as-code. Advisory mode - generates configurations without executing.

commands.name: pipeline
commands.description: Generate or analyze CI/CD pipeline configurations (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Azure DevOps, CircleCI)

commands.name: docker
commands.description: Generate optimized Dockerfile, docker-compose, or analyze container configurations with security hardening

commands.name: deploy-check
commands.description: Pre-deployment checklist and environment validation with security scanning

commands.name: infra
commands.description: Infrastructure as code generation (Terraform, Pulumi, CloudFormation, Kubernetes manifests)
